response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in its utility and impact on your endeavors. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is a chance to secure a remarkable asset at a price that is both fair and beneficial to both parties. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 1350000}
